divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my mom when it happened. She was on a businesstrip in Sunne, Sweden. I'm not sure about the date, but I am pretty sure it was the end of July, 2006. We were staying at the "Selma Lagerl���f Spa & Hotell". When the time was maybe... 10.45PM I went back to our room. My mom was still downstairs talking with some friends. I think our room was on the 4th floor. I'm sure it was the top floor, but I can't remember how many floors there were. I undressed and got ready to go to bed. But, wanting to see the stars, which I love, I went out on the balcony and looked up in the sky. The first thing I noticed was 3 lights, much more powerful than the stars. They were shaped in a perfect triangle and they were colored... I think there was two white and one red. However, the red light was switching all the time. In a random or advanced pattern, the red light switched positions all the time, maybe one switch per second. Of course, a white light took it's previous place. I looked amazed at the sky, because I have always loved UFO:s, science and the paranormal. I had goosebumps all over, my heart was pounding and I felt really happy. I ran for my cellphone with camera and tried to film it. But cellphones aren't so good at filming the nightsky with, and I couldn't see anything on it. Instead, I looked at the time. It was 11.02PM. That I can remember perfectly. As first I had seen the triangle, I thought it was a UFO. I tried to make it look like something else. But a plane moves, this one was standing perfectly still. A plane has different lights, with simplr patterns and other colors. A tower needs... a tower. And there was no such tower beneath it. A helicopter makes noise, this was noiseless. So I finally came to the conclusion that this was a UFO or something that looked very much like it. I watched it for maybe 5 minutes, but it didn't do anything at all. So, I went to bed. But I was truly happy, because I felt that maybe they weren't moving because the lights were a message for me or that they were watching me.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sunne
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: A triangular object hovered above our hotel
